data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smit, John T. (2019): Robber flies from Sint Eustatius, Lesser Antilles, with the descriptions of Efferia exaggerata sp. n. and the male of Ommatius prolongatus Scarbrough (Diptera: Asilidae). Zootaxa 4586 (1): 141-150, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4586.1.7|2 occurrences
